cards.text: Whenever another player uses the "Fishing" Action space, you may pay them 1 Food and receive 1 Bonus point.

cards.name: Wood Barterer
cards.text: Each time before you use an action space with a "Build Fences" or "Build Rooms" action, you can choose to either get 2 wood or exchange up to 2 wood for 1 reed each.

cards.name: Wood Buyer
cards.text: Whenever another player receives Wood from an action, you can buy 1 Wood from him/her for 1 Food (even without his/her agreement.)

cards.name: Wood Carrier
cards.text: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 wood fore each improvement in front of you.

cards.name: Wood Cart
cards.text: Whenever you use a person to take Wood that is on an Action space, you receive 2 additional Wood.

cards.name: Wood Carver
cards.text: In each round, you pay 1 Wood less for one of the following: an Improvement, a Room of a Wooden hut, a stable or a fence.

cards.name: Wood Collector
cards.text: Place 1 Wood on each of the next 5 Round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you receive the Wood.

cards.name: Wood Cutter
cards.text: Each time you use a wood accumulation space, you get 1 additional wood.

cards.name: Wood Deliveryman
cards.text: Place 1 Wood on each remaining space for rounds 8 to 14. At the start of these rounds, you receive the Wood.

cards.name: Wood Distributor
cards.text: At the start of the Work phase, you can distribute the Wood from the "3 Wood" Action space as evenly as possible onto the neighboring Clay, Reed and Fishing spaces. When you play this card, you receive 2 Wood.

cards.name: Wood Expert
cards.text: When you play this card, you immediately get 2 wood. Each improvement costs you up to 2 wood less, if you pay 1 food instead.

cards.name: Wood Expert
cards.text: When you play this card, you immediately get 2 wood. Each improvement costs you up to 2 wood less, if you pay 1 food instead.

cards.name: Wood Field
cards.text: You can plant wood on this card as though it were 2 fields, but it is considered 1 field. Sow and harvest wood on this card as you would grain.

cards.name: Wood Gatherers
cards.text: Each round, if you spend 4 or more Wood for Improvements, rooms, stables, or fences, you receive 2 Wood at the end of the round.

cards.name: Wood Harvester
cards.text: In the field phase of each harvest, you get 1 wood/1 food for each wood accumulation space with exactly 2 wood/at least 3 wood.

cards.name: Wood Palisades
cards.text: Instead of a fence piece, you can place 2 wood from your supply on the fence spaces at the edge of your farmyard. These fence spaces with 2 wood are worth 1 bonus point.

cards.name: Wood Pile
cards.text: You immediately get a number of wood equal to the number of people you have on accumulation spaces.

cards.name: Wood Rake
cards.text: During scoring, if you had at least 7 goods in your fields before the final harvest, you get 2 bonus points.

cards.name: Wood Saw
cards.text: Whenever every other player has more Family members than you, you may immediately build 1 or more rooms by paying their cost.

cards.name: Wood Slide Hammer
cards.text: On your first renovation, if you have at least 5 wood rooms, you can renovate to stone directly and you get a discount of 2 stone on the renovation cost.

cards.name: Wood Worker
cards.text: Whenever you use any Action space, immediately afterward you may place 1 Food from your supply on the space to receive 1 Wood. (The next player to use this Action space receives the Food.)

cards.name: Wood Worker
cards.text: Each time you take wood from an accumulation space, you can exchange 1 wood for 1 sheep. Place the wood on the accumulation space.

cards.name: Wood Workshop
cards.text: Each time before you play or build an improvement, you get 1 wood.

cards.name: Wood-Fired Oven
cards.text: Whenever you use the "Bake bread" action, you can use the Wood-fired Oven to turn any number of Grain into 3 Food each. When you play this card, you can also take the "Bake bread" action.

cards.name: Woodcraft
cards.text: Each time you use a wood accumulation space, if immediately afterward you have at most 5 wood in your supply, you get 1 food.

cards.name: Woodcutter
cards.text: You receive 1 additional Wood whenever you use a Family member's action to take Wood.

cards.name: Wooden Bridge
cards.text: Whenever you use the "1 Reed" Action space, you receive 1 additional Food. Whenever you use the "Day Laborer" Action space, you receive 1 additional Reed.

cards.name: Wooden Buttons
cards.text: Immediately take 1 Guest token for each empty room in your home. Place these Guests as you would additional Family members and return them at the end of this round. You do not have room for offspring this round.

cards.name: Wooden Crane
cards.text: Whenever you use one of the "Stone" Action spaces that are placed in Stage 2 and 4, you receive 1 additional Stone. If you pay 1 Food, you can take 2 Stone instead of 1.

cards.name: Wooden Draisine
cards.text: You can use 2 orthogonally adjacent Accumulation spaces on the same game board with 1 person by placing the person between the spaces. (Afterward, both spaces count as occupied.) You must leave 2 of the items on each space.

cards.name: Wooden Gable
cards.text: At the end of the game, if all of your rooms hold exactly 1 Family member, you receive 3 Bonus points.

cards.name: Wooden Hut Builder
cards.text: At the end of the game, you receive 1 bonus point for each room in your Wooden hut.

cards.name: Wooden Hut Extender
cards.text: Wood rooms now cost you 1 reed, and additionally 5 wood through round 5, 4 wood in rounds 6 and 7, and 3 wood in round 8 and later.

cards.name: Wooden Hut Extender
cards.text: Wood rooms now cost you 1 reed, and additionally 5 wood through round 5, 4 wood in rounds 6 and 7, and 3 wood in round 8 and later.

cards.name: Wooden Hut Extension
cards.text: When you play this card, immediately extend your Wooden hut by 1 room. (The room does not cost anything, but you must pay the cost shown to play this card.)

cards.name: Wooden Path
cards.text: The player with the most valuable street receives 2 Bonus points when scoring. (The Paved Road that costs 5 Stone is more valuable than the Clay Path that costs 3 Clay which is more valuable that this Wooden Path.)

cards.name: Wooden Shed
cards.text: This card can only be played via a "Major Improvement" action. It provides room for one person. You may no longer renovate.

cards.name: Wooden Shoes
cards.text: Whenever you use a Stage 1 Action space (Round 1 to 4 spaces), you may reveal the next round card and place it in front of you. You and only you can use it this round. (At the start of next round, return the Action space to the board and all players use it normally.)

cards.name: Wooden Strongbox
cards.text: At the end of the game, you get 2 Bonus points if your home contains 5 rooms or 4 Bonus points if you have 6 or more rooms.

cards.name: Wooden Whey Bucket
cards.text: Each time before you use the "Sheep Market"/"Cattle Market" accumulation space, you can build exactly 1 stable for 1 wood/at no cost.

cards.name: Woodshacker
cards.text: In the work phase of each round, the first and the second time you use a wood accumulation space, you also get 1 and 2 clay respectively.

cards.name: Wool Blankets
cards.text: During scoring, if you live in a wooden/clay/stone house by then, you get 3/2/0 bonus points.

cards.name: Woolgrower
cards.text: This card can hold a number of sheep equal to the number of completed feeding phases.

cards.name: Work Certificate
cards.text: Each time after you use an action space, you can take 1 building resource from a building resource accumulation space with at least 4 building resources on it.

cards.name: Work Permit
cards.text: Add 1 to the current round for each building resource you have and place 1 person from your supply on the corresponding round space. In that round, you can use the person.

cards.name: Workaholic
cards.text: When you play the card, if there are no animals on your farm, place 5 Wood, 4 Clay, and 3 Stone on this card. At any time, if you have 5/7/9 animals, you receive all the Wood/ Clay/ Stone on this card.

cards.name: Workshop Assistant
cards.text: Place a unique pair of different building resources on each of your improvements. Each time another player renovates, you may move one such pair to your supply.

cards.name: Worm Bait
cards.text: Whenever you use the "Plow 1 field" Action space, add 2 Food from the general supply to this card. You receive the Food on this card when you use the "Fishing" action. Each Harvest, return 1 Food from this card (if any) to the general supply.

cards.name: Wounded Veteran
cards.text: At the start of each round, you receive 2 Food from the general supply. Whenever you take Building resources or animals from an Accumulation space, you must leave 1 of them on the space.

cards.name: Writing Boards
cards.text: You immediately get 1 wood for each occupation you have in front of you.

cards.name: Writing Chamber
cards.text: During scoring, you get a number of bonus points equal to the total of negative points you have, to a maximum of 7 bonus points.

cards.name: Writing Desk
cards.text: Whenever you use an "Occupation" Action, you may play 2 Occupations one after another. The second Occupation costs you 2 Food.

cards.name: Writing Maniac
cards.text: Place 1 Occupation (from your hand) face down on each space for rounds 5,7,9, and 11. At the start of these rounds, you can pay 2 Food to play the Occupation. If you do not, return it to your hand.

cards.name: Year of Disaster
cards.text: Between the next Harvest and the Harvest after that, each other player must pay 1 Food to the general supply at the start of each Work phase. If they cannot pay 1 Food, they receive 1 negative point.

cards.name: Yeoman Farmer
cards.text: At the end of the game, you only lose points for Unused spaces and Begging cards.

cards.name: Yoke
cards.text: When you play this card, you can immediately Plow 1 field for each Plow that has been played (by any player) and 1 field for the harrow, if it has been played.

cards.name: Young Animal Market
cards.text: You immediately get 1 cattle. (Effectively, you are exchanging 1 sheep for 1 cattle.)

cards.name: Young Artist
cards.text: In the returning home phase of each round, you can pay 1 food to either take a "Minor Improvement" action or to draw 2 new minor improvements.

cards.name: Young Farmer
cards.text: Each time you use the "Major Improvement" action space, you also get 1 grain and, afterward, you can take a "Sow" action.

cards.name: Zigzag Harrow
cards.text: You can immediately plow 1 field such that it completes a "zigzag" pattern.
